name: Anemo Support
description: This build empowers Venti's energy recharge to minimize the downtime of his Elemental Burst skill. The Stringless is the preferred weapon.

name: Aimed Shot
description: The idea behind this build is to fire a powerful, fully charged Aimed Shot with Venti every 10 seconds, taking advantage of the extra 2 arrows from his first constellation, Splitting Gale.
